full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Project Title:** U87 Electric Vehicle Charging Station

**Tender Number:** cb-178-26799616, Amendment #2

**Solicitation Number:** 24-58024-B

**Closing Date:** July 11, 2024, 14:00

**Notice of Opportunity:**

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites bids for the installation of a Level 3 Electric Vehicle (EV) Charger outside Building U-87 located at the Lester Road Campus of the NRC.

**Scope of Work:**

The proposed project include the installation of an electric vehicle charging station for Level 3 charging, outside building U87.

**Critical Requirements:**

* Bidders must have a minimum of 10 years of experience as a general contractor providing construction services comparable to this project.
* Proposed Construction Site Supervisor and Project Manager must have a minimum of 7 years of experience in a similar position.
* Bidder must be a member of a recognized general contractor association in Ontario.

**Selection Criteria:**

Bidders will be evaluated based on a combination of technical score (40%) and price rating (60%).

**Mandatory Requirements:**

 Failure to meet any of the following requirements will result in non-compliance and rejection of the bid:

* Bidder must provide a valid WSIB (Workplace Safety and Insurance Board) certificate with their tender or prior to contract award.
* Bidder must comply with the Canadian industrial security requirements, including holding a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and having RELIABILITY STATUS for all personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites.
* Bidder must sign the Mandatory Site Visit Attendance form prior to leaving the site.

**Tender Process:**

Bids must be submitted by email only to NRC.BidReceiving-ReceptiondesSoumissions.CNRC@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca. Tender documents are available on the Buyandsell.gc.ca TMA service provider.

**Security Requirements:**

Bidders must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) and include it with their tender or provide it within 48 hours from the date and time of tender closing. Verifications will be made through CISD to confirm the security clearance status of the Bidder.

**Financial Proposal:**

The financial proposal will remain sealed and only the technical components of the proposals considered responsive will be reviewed, evaluated and rated by a NRC Evaluation
